summary: This bill, the District of Columbia Local Funds Act of 2025, appropriates local funds for the District of Columbia for the fiscal year 2025. It references the Fiscal Year 2025 Local Budget Act of 2024 and specifies that appropriations are drawn from the General Fund. The bill sets limitations on the total amount appropriated for operating expenses, tying it to revenue estimates and allowing increases for one-time transactions under specific conditions. It also details the role of the Chief Financial Officer in ensuring compliance.
